tool_description: Compares reviews to detect duplicates, near-duplicates, and suspicious similarity patterns that may indicate coordinated fake reviews.

target_review.description: The review text to compare against others

comparison_reviews.description: Array of review texts to compare against

similarity_algorithm.description: Algorithm to use: cosine, jaccard, levenshtein

similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score to flag as duplicate (0-1)

ignore_common_phrases.description: Whether to ignore common review phrases when computing similarity

error_messages: Empty target review: Target review text cannot be empty
No comparison reviews: comparison_reviews array cannot be empty
Invalid similarity algorithm: Use one of [cosine, jaccard, levenshtein]
Invalid similarity threshold: Threshold must be between 0 and 1
Too many comparison reviews: Maximum 100 reviews allowed for comparison
usage: Provide a target review and array of reviews to compare against. Set similarity algorithm and threshold for customized duplicate detection sensitivity.

similar_reviews_count.description: Number of reviews that exceeded the similarity threshold

duplicate_detected.description: Whether duplicate or near-duplicate content was found

similarity_scores.description: Array of similarity scores for each comparison review
